stephane.manager.file_architecture¶

Created on Thu Oct 1 11:54:32 2015 @author: stephane This file list all the possible locations of my data (Stephane, Gautam, Some of Joseph, examples from Martin) If a new directory tree is created for storing data, just add its root on the list below (Dir_data variable) If you get trouble to access the data from a distant computer, add a new extension “distant_root” to the list below and an additionnal case in the method os_c

Functions

get_dir(date)

Return the directory in which the data corresponding to the date given are stored. Look in any of the specified rootfolder INPUT ----- date : str date to be processed OUTPUT path : str path of the rootdir -----.

os_c(Dir)

os_i(filename)
